page.title: 05FOOD
page.content: Some of our girls in our class interviewed the children at Carnock School and Milesmark School to find the favourite food of children. We found that the most popular food in Carnock was salad.And the most popular food in Milesmark School are crisps and pizzas . We found in Carnock School that quiet a lot of people ate apples but at Milesmark School hardly anybody ate fruit at Carnock School 40 children stay for School dinners and packlunches where as at Milesmark School only 20 people stay for School dinners and and 8 for packlunches. The popular thing the children ate was crisps out of Milesmark and Carnock School. My favourite food is salad , crisps and beans.
